Chinese.Description: 你的四肢变成八条蛛腿，你可以像蜘蛛一样移动，但你现在只能用嘴叼着一件东西。同时，你的食量增大，并倾向于食肉。蜘蛛将不再敌视你，但是，闪光果和烟雾果对你是致命的。

English.Description: Turns slugcat into a spider hybrid, slugcat will have the mobility of a spider but must eat more food. Slugcat will be able to eat meat and other spiders will no longer be aggressive towards it.Beware that Flare Bomb and Spore Cloud are deadly to you.
